file_content.text: We're free and clear... but it's not looking good out here.
The ship is free, all systems in the green. Not sure for how long, though... the situation is pretty grim out here.
We're clear, but I'm seeing a lot of red dots on the sensor grid out here... what's the plan?
We're all clear, Captain! More bad guys out here than I can count, though....
That did it--we're free! But, uh... there's an awful lot of those guys out here.
Hah! We're loose! Just got to pick one of the million some-odd ships out here to shoot at first....
We're clear to fly... but the odds are not looking good out here.
We're loose--nice going. But I can't say things are better out here than they were in there.
Make a break for it.
We can't just leave you behind!
You have to. Please, Kira.
All right... but you'd better be right behind us. May the Force be with you, Master.
And leave you behind? Not a chance!
That is not an option, Major! We are not leaving you here!
And leave you in the middle of all this? Not a chance!
What? And just leave you here, in the middle of all this?
And leave you here to rot? Are you kidding me?
No! We are not leaving you behind!
Are you joking? You want us to ditch you?
Do what you can to cover us from out there. We need all the help we can get.
Stay and defend Marr's ship.
All right--we'll give it our best shot. May the Force be with you.
Understood. We'll fly a defensive pattern and try to draw some of the enemy fire. Stay safe.
Copy that--we'll show 'em what Havoc Squad's made of. Good luck, Major.
You can say that again. We'll give it everything we've got--stay alive in there.
Fancy flying, coming right up! Just don't expect any miracles, okay?
It's time for these slugs to learn who they're messing with.
Consider it done--just hang in there, boss.
Two against... huh. The readout isn't set for numbers that high. Two against a lot--should be fun. See you on the other side.
I'm giving you an order, Jorgan. Move it.
Understood. We'll make sure reinforcements and medical crews are ready when you catch up--good luck.
I've gotten out of worse. I'll be right behind you--go!
I won't be far behind--don't get any ideas.
All right. I'm gonna hold you to that.
If you say so. We'll hold you a seat at the sabacc table--don't keep us waiting.
I'm counting on you. Hurry, Felix.
Blast it... all right. Just don't be far behind us. We're counting on you, too.
Yes. It is the only way.
I... if you say so. We'll bring whatever help we can find, just... don't die out here.
You are. Get moving--fast.
Blasted, stubborn... you'd better be right behind us. I mean it.
If you see an opening to escape, take it. Someone has to make it back to the Republic.
If you see an opening to escape, take it. Someone has to make it back to civilization.
If you see an opening to escape, take it. Someone has to make it back to the Empire.
I'm commanding you. Hurry.
All right. It's your call. Just... do us a favor and don't die out here, huh?
The enemy has breached the engineering deck--they're after the primary generator. I'm on my way now--meet me there.
